sampleQuery.description: View the counts and percent distribution of active licenses by entity type

meta.description: This API returns the counts and percent distribution of active licenses by entity type. There are four entity categories: Individual, Business, Government and Other. This API provides information on the number of licenses held by various entities. Many different types of entities hold licenses with the Commission; these have been categorized into four groups: Individual, Business, Government and Other.
